title: AI Personal Website
description: A React-based personal portfolio that acts like an AI chat interface. Features simulated conversation, reliable keyword matching, and a premium dark mode aesthetic.

title: E-Commerce Bundle
description: Optimized product page bundle for high-performance e-commerce sites. Reduced load time by 40% via server-side data fetching.

title: Visa Auto-Docs
description: Automated system for generating work visa documents (Contracts, POAs) from passport data. Saves 20+ hours of manual work per week.
